code: import React from"react";import{addPostActionCreate,updateNewPostTextActionCreate}from"../../../redux/profile-reducer";import MyPosts from"./MyPosts";import{connect}from"react-redux";var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{posts:state.profilePage.posts,newPostText:state.profilePage.newPostText};};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{addPost:function addPost(newPostText){dispatch(addPostActionCreate(newPostText));}};};var MyPostsContainer=connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(MyPosts);export default MyPostsContainer;
